text: braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadantiq sa tvA a#ddhvaqryuH syAqdyaH sOma#mupAvaqharaqnth sarvA$ByO dEqvatA$Bya upAvaqharEqditi# hRuqdE tvEtyA#ha manuqShyE$Bya EqvaitEna# karOtiq mana#sEq tvEtyA#ha piqtRuBya# EqvaitEna# karOti diqvE tvAq sUryA#yaq tvEtyA#ha dEqvEBya# EqvaitEna# karOtyEqtAva#tIqrvai dEqvatAqstABya# Eqvainaq(gm)q sarvA$Bya uqpAva#harati puqrA vAqcaH- [  ] 12
